verbose_text: Giving that Ginkgetin potently inhibited Wnt signaling, we next investigated whether it down-regulated Wnt signaling in MB cells, with the detection of the expression of the target genes, namely Axin2 [XREF_BIBR], cyclinD1 [XREF_BIBR] and survivin [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression of the target genes, namely Axin2
